Name: Crispy Puppy
About the game: Crispy Puppy is a horror game about a very old creepypasta. In one of the abandoned camps, among the forests and old buildings, a creature called Crispy Puppy roams, no one has ever heard of such a camp, and those who have been there do not say anything about it, and only fear is read in their eyes. According to legend, under the camp itself there is a huge factory in which terrible human fears are created. In the game you have to go through several tests and avoid the terrible fate of being eaten Game Features: multiple locations, AI difficulty generation, pixel art by LOLIGPAPH.
